networkError: Network error. Check your internet connection

tooltips.sequence: Sequenctial index. You can format it with leading zeros {num, 3} or without them {num}
tooltips.dateTime: Item creation date and time. You can format it like date, for example "dd.MM.yyyy" or time "HH:mm"
tooltips.guid: Globally unique id. You can format it with template {uid}
tooltips.rnd6digit: Random 6-digit value. You can format it as decimal {num} or hexadecimal {hex}
tooltips.rnd9digit: Random 9-digit value. You can format it as decimal {num} or hexadecimal {hex}
tooltips.rnd20bit: Random 20-bit value. You can format it as decimal {num} or hexadecimal {hex}
tooltips.rnd32bit: Random 32-bit value. You can format it as decimal {num} or hexadecimal {hex}
